text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS With respect to novel coronavirus pandemic, Speaker Pelosi said Trump's  “denial at the beginning was deadly” and that people are dying as he “fiddles.”  I strongly agree & give him little credit for stopping people from entering our country from where the deadly virus came from.
